data.event: In 1999, this town was damaged by the 921 earthquake.

event.title: now a major attraction in Puli Township, Taomi Village was transformed

data.event: Especially after the opening of the Paper Dome, now a major attraction in Puli Township, Taomi Village was transformed from a sleepy agricultural village to one that is busting with activities related to community redevelopment and eco-tourism.
